body:
subj, in https://github.com/LLNL/spack/commit/44b89474453bf80fd603eb5ea5b629b0d9dff123

```
==> Building arpack-ng
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/Users/davydden/spack/lib/spack/spack/build_environment.py", line 367, in fork
    function()
  File "/Users/davydden/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py", line 910, in build_process
    self.install(self.spec, self.prefix)
  File "/Users/davydden/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/arpack-ng/package.py", line 54, in install
    which('libtoolize')()
TypeError: 'NoneType' object is not callable
==> Error: Installation process had nonzero exit code.
```

with

```
ackages:
  libtool:
    paths:
      libtool@2.4.6%clang@7.0.2-apple: <system> 
    buildable: False
```

as on Darwin where is no `libtoolize`.
title: arpack-ng is broken on OSX with native libtool
